name: FikraTracker
description: Self-hosted, Node.js based analytics tool for those who care about privacy - FikraTracker

FIKRA_USERNAME.description: Username which will be used to log in to FikraTracker

FIKRA_PASSWORD.description: Password which will be used to log in to FikraTracker

FIKRA_MONGODB.description: MongoDB URI which will be used to connect a database to FikraTracker

FIKRA_ALLOW_ORIGIN.description: Tracked domains which will be used on FikraTracker (CORS headers)

FIKRA_AUTO_ORIGIN.description: Automatically add CORS headers for domains with fully qualified domain names as titles

FIKRA_TTL.description: Specifies how long a FikraTracker TTL token is valid (Default: 3600000)

FIKRA_TRACKER.description: Specifies a custom name for the tracking script (Default: tracker.js)
